name: Rain (itch) (AuraDee)
description:
Coins rain down from the skies. Collect them with your bucket to try to make a fortune! As you gather more and more coins you'll unlock some new friends to play as.

Originally published in 2015. The game has been left largely as it was when it was released.
NOTE: The browser version of the game will not save scores between sessions

Controls

Arrow Keys: Movement, Move through menus
Shift \ Z: Jump, Select
Ctrl \ X: Deselect
Enter: Pause
Alt+(1, 2, 3, 4): Change window size, Fullscreen
Esc: Quit

Credits

CaveStory.org Forums: Various music
